channel.title: tools on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in tools on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-12
item.description: Microsoft and Nvidia team up to train one of the world’s largest language models (7 minute read) Microsoft and Nvidia have trained what they claim is the largest and most capable AI-powered language model to date.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-08
item.description: Here’s everything Apple announced at the WWDC 2021 keynote (6 minute read) Apple’s Worldwide Developer Conference was full of announcements with all the new things coming to its various devices.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-15
item.description: Zoom is releasing a new tool to let paid users charge for admission to online events like conferences or fitness classes (3 minute read) OnZoom is Zoom’s new online event hosting platform.
